sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-dialog max-width="600px" v-model="dialog">
        <template v-slot:activator="{ on, attrs }">
            <v-btn v-bind="attrs" v-on="on">Add Member</v-btn>
        </template>
        <v-form ref="form">
            <v-card>
                <v-card-title>Add Member</v-card-title>
                <v-divider></v-divider>
                <v-card-text class="pt-5 pb-0">
                    <v-text-field label="Name" v-model="employee.name" outlined color="indigo"></v-text-field>
                    <v-text-field label="Title" v-model="employee.title" outlined color="indigo"></v-text-field>
                    <v-text-field label="Team" v-model="employee.team" outlined color="indigo"></v-text-field>
                    <v-text-field label="Email" v-model="employee.email" outlined color="indigo"></v-text-field>
                    <v-text-field label="Avatar" v-model="employee.avatar" outlined color="indigo"></v-text-field>
                    <v-text-field label="Username" v-model="employee.user_name" outlined color="indigo"></v-text-field>
                    <v-text-field label="Password" v-model="employee.password" outlined color="indigo"></v-text-field>
                    <v-text-field label="Role" v-model="employee.role" outlined color="indigo"></v-text-field>
                </v-card-text>
                <v-divider></v-divider>
                <v-card-action class="d-flex justify-end pa-3">
                    <v-btn class="indigo white--text" @click="validate">Add Member</v-btn>
                    <v-btn class="indigo white--text" @click="closePopup">Cancel</v-btn>
                </v-card-action>
            </v-card>
        </v-form>
    </v-dialog>
</template>
<script>

import TeamService from '../services/TeamService';
import axios from 'axios';

export default {
    data() {
        return {
            dialog: false,
            dateMenu: false,
            title: '',
            info: '',
        items: [],
            inputRules: [
                v => v.length > 0 || 'Please provide the input'
            ],

            employee: {
                id: this.initialContent.id,
                avatar: this.initialContent.avatar,
                email: this.initialContent.email,
                name: this.initialContent.name,
                password:this.initialContent.password,
                team:this.initialContent.team,
                title:this.initialContent.title,
                user_name:this.initialContent.user_name,
                role:this.initialContent.role
        }
        }
    },
    methods: {
        validate() {
            if (this.$refs.form.validate()) {
                this.$emit('addedProject', this.title);
                this.dialog = false;
            }
            try {
                const response = axios.post('http://localhost:8080/employees', this.task);
                console.log('Response:', response.data);
            } catch (error) {
                console.error('Error:', error);
            }
            this.employee.avatar= '',
            this.employee.email= '',
            this.employee.name='',
            this.employee.password='',
            this.employee.team='',
            this.employee.title='',
            this.employee.user_name='',
            this.employee.role='',
            this.dialog = false,
            this.dateMenu= false
        }, 
        closePopup() {
            if (this.$refs.form.validate()) {
                this.dialog = false;
            }
            this.employee.avatar= '',
            this.employee.email= '',
            this.employee.name='',
            this.employee.password='',
            this.employee.team='',
            this.employee.title='',
            this.employee.user_name='',
            this.employee.role='',
            this.dialog = false,
            this.dateMenu= false
        },
        getEmployees(){
                TeamService.getEmployees().then((response)=>{
                    this.items=response.data;
                });
            }
    },
        created() {
            this.getEmployees();
        }
}
</script>
